text:
Here's a sample test which I believe is a valid example of re-defining an 
<attributeGroup> by "restriction" but the parser reports errors.

4_2_2v18.xml
============
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<svi:Father xmlns:xsi         ="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
            xmlns:svi         ="http://www.Test.org/4_2_2v"
            xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.Test.org/4_2_2v
                                4_2_2v18.xsd">
<svi:Pet NickName="Spot" Sex="F" Age="10"/>
<svi:Pet NickName="Socks" Sex="M" Age="5"/>
</svi:Father>

4_2_2v18.xsd
============
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<schema xmlns          ="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
        targetNamespace="http://www.Test.org/4_2_2v"
        xmlns:sv       ="http://www.Test.org/4_2_2v">

<redefine schemaLocation="4_2_2v18_inc.xsd">
  <attributeGroup name="attGroup">
    <attribute name="Age" type="positiveInteger"/>
    <attribute name="Sex" type="sv:sexType" use="required"/>
    <attribute name="NickName">
      <simpleType>
        <restriction base="string">
          <maxLength value="40"/>
        </restriction>
      </simpleType>
    </attribute>
  </attributeGroup>
</redefine>

<element name="Father">
  <complexType>
    <sequence>
      <element ref="sv:Pet" maxOccurs="10"/>
    </sequence>
  </complexType>
</element>

</schema>

4_2_2v18_inc.xsd
================
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">

<xs:attributeGroup name="attGroup">
  <xs:attribute name="Age" type="xs:integer"/>
  <xs:attribute name="Sex" type="sexType"/>
  <xs:attribute name="NickName" type="xs:string"/>
</xs:attributeGroup>

<xs:simpleType name="sexType">
  <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
    <xs:enumeration value="M"/>
    <xs:enumeration value="F"/>
  </xs:restriction>
</xs:simpleType>

<xs:element name="Pet">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:attributeGroup ref="attGroup"/>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

</xs:schema>
creator: mhuffman@ca.ibm.com
neilg@ca.ibm.com
text:
The problem was that we read in the restricted attributeGroup under the same 
name as the attributeGroup being restricted.  This caused problems when we 
finally got to the restricted attributeGroup.
